title: New Gazette issued increasing price of Paracetamol
content: The Ministry of Health has issued a Gazette notification announcing the Maximum Retail Price (MRP) of a 500mg Paracetamol tablet.As per the Gazette, the MRP of a 500mg Paracetamol tablet is Rs. 2.30.The Ministry said the new MRP has been imposed with effect from 28th February 2022.Earlier, a 500mg Paracetamol tablet was sold at Rs. 1.71.
